    <facet>

      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE3167</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Cooperative Learning In English Lessons – It Really Works!</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kooperatives Lernen In den Englischen Lektionen? 
Es Wirklich Arbeiten!</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Étude Coopérative Dans des Leçons Anglaises ? 
Il Vraiment Travaux !</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Aprendizagem Cooperativa Em Lições Inglesas? 
Ele Realmente Trabalhos!</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Imparare Cooperativo Nelle Lezioni Inglesi? 
Esso Realmente Impianti!</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Συνεταιριστική εκμάθηση στα αγγλικά μαθήματα; 
Λειτουργεί πραγματικά!</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">¿El Aprender Cooperativo En Lecciones Inglesas? 
¡Él Realmente Trabajos!</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">An article about the succesful use of Cooperative Learning strategies as implemented by an experienced teacher in an experimental school in Israel</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">English</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">learning strategies</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">cooperative learning.</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ein Artikel über den succesful Gebrauch von kooperativen 
Lernenstrategien, wie von einem erfahrenen Lehrer in einer 
experimentellen Schule in Israel eingeführt</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Un article concernant l'utilisation succesful des 
stratégies d'étude coopératives comme mise en application par un 
professeur expérimenté dans une école expérimentale en Israel</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Um artigo sobre o uso succesful de estratégias de 
aprendizagem cooperativas como executado por um professor experiente 
em uma escola experimental em Israel</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Un articolo sull'uso succesful delle strategie di 
apprendimento cooperative come effettuato da un insegnante con 
esperienza in una scuola sperimentale nell'Israele</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ένα άρθρο για τη succesful χρήση των 
συνεταιριστικών στρατηγικών εκμάθησης όπως εφαρμόζεται από έναν
πεπειραμένο δάσκαλο σε ένα πειραματικό σχολείο στο Ισραήλ</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Un artículo acerca del uso succesful de estrategias que 
aprenden cooperativas según lo puesto en ejecucio'n por un profesor 
experimentado en una escuela experimental en Israel</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Englisch</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Lernenstrategien</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">kooperatives Lernen.</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Anglais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">stratégies d'étude</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>

            <string language="x-mt-it">imparare cooperativo.</string>

          </keyword>
